303.question: How big are the datasets?

6-Table2-1.png: The datasets are quite large, with the in-house datasets having between 390 to 507 documents in each category, and the ACE05 datasets having between 479 to 507 documents in each category.</s>
The datasets are quite large, with the in-house datasets having between 390 to 507 documents in each category, and the ACE05 datasets having between 479 to 507 documents in each category.</s>
